goal.ch: 促使參加師資培育課程的學生，了解學校中課堂課室教學與行政規劃的現況，透過學校課室實地試教建立課室教學該有的關注焦點及概念，於教學實習中磨練板書、口語語調、教學態度與班級經營掌控能力，並掌握規劃與設計課程的能力，期望培養準教師具備進入教育職場所需要的教學專業。
goal.en: Encourage students participating in teacher training courses to understand the current situation of classroom teaching and administrative planning in schools, establish classroom teaching focus and concepts through on-the-spot trials in school classrooms, and hone blackboard writing, oral intonation, and teaching attitudes in teaching practice With the ability to manage and control the class, as well as the ability to plan and design courses, it is expected to train prospective teachers to have the teaching profession needed to enter the education workplace.

outline.ch:
週次一：課程介紹、教學活動安排、教學前準備
週次二：班級教學情境模擬和問題討論
週次三：教學錄影帶之觀摩與探討。
週次四：拜訪觀摩學校召開試教前協調會
週次五~七：教案內容、板書配置、輔助教材等修訂指導
週次八：校外教學觀摩
週次九~十二：上台實際試教與流程修訂
週次十三：召開試教後檢討會
週次十四~十六：教學試教錄影帶觀賞、檢討與建議
outline.en:
1.Course introduction, arrangement of teaching activities, pre-teaching preparation
2.Class teaching situation simulation and problem discussion
3.Observation and discussion of teaching video tapes
4.Visit the school to observe and hold a pre-teaching coordination meeting
5~7.Guidance on the revision of teaching plan content, blackboard layout, auxiliary teaching materials, etc. (1.2.3)
8.Off-campus teaching observation
9~12.Practical trial teaching and process revision on stage (1.2.3.4)
13.Hold a post-teaching review meeting
14~16.Watching, Reviewing and Suggesting Teaching and Trial Videos (1.2.3)
